description.lang: FIBARO Home Center Lite is a device designed to manage your intelligent home using the FIBARO System. It is a smaller, but almost equally powerful version of FIBARO Home Center 2. The user-friendly, graphic interface allows for creating scenarios of lighting, roller blinds or gates, setting suitable temperature through the schedules of heating or cooling, integrating the multimedia and taking care of the safety by setting the IP cameras. Fibaro Home Center Lite can be controlled from anywhere in the world, using your tablet or smartphone.
